meanings.definition: The quality or state of being talkative or chatty.
meanings.sent1: Her talkinesses made her the life of the party.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy her talkinesses during our coffee dates.
meanings.sent3: His talkinesses at the meeting kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: The talkinesses of the radio host filled the airwaves.
meanings.sent5: The talkinesses of the parrot amused the visitors.

meanings.definition: Excessive verbosity or wordiness in speech or writing.
meanings.sent1: The professor's talkinesses in lectures made it hard to stay awake.
meanings.sent2: I struggle to read articles with too much talkinesses.
meanings.sent3: The politician's talkinesses led to a long and boring speech.
meanings.sent4: The book's talkinesses drowned out the main message.
meanings.sent5: The talkinesses of the advertisement made it hard to understand the product.
